full_summary:
# Request for Proposals for NGINX Software Subscription Licenses, Maintenance, and Support

**Title**: SSC BPM021121 (B)  - NGINX Software Subscription Licenses, Maintenance and Support for AAFC

**Reference Number**: SSC-24-00026265:T

** Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Category**: General Department (GD)

**Region of Opportunity**: Canada

**Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR) and Ontario (except NCR)

## Request Overview

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals for NGINX software subscription licenses, maintenance, and support for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) in Ottawa, Ontario. The Request for Quotations (RFQ) document is available on the SSC website.

**Key Requirements**

* NGINX software subscription licenses for AAFC in Ottawa, Ontario
* Maintenance and support services for the NGINX software
* Comply with all requirements outlined in the RFQ document

**Bid Submission Requirements**

* Submissions must be electronic
* Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances

**Evaluation Criteria**

* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award

**Additional Information**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

**Contact Information**

* Name: Agnes Kowalska
* Title: Contracting Authority
* Phone: 343-551-9034
* Fax: 000-000-0000
* Email: [None]
* Address: Data Centers and Internal Services, PVR Shared Services Canada, 180 Kent St., 13 Floor, PO Box 9808, STS T, Ottawa, Ontario, K1G 4A8

## Attachments

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/866DD6F5-DE61-42CE-9195-1A3BFD7D3D4C
